channel.title: playerName+?
channel.description: Sup, just wondering, i want a few things to say the first letter of a players name in uppercase, but they don't. I know when you type a message it shows the first letter in upper case, just wondering how it does it. Thanks in advance...

item.title: playerName+?
item.dc:creator: @mikescott mikescott
item.description:
@mikescott wrote:

yes but when i log in with mikescott it changes it to Mikescott automatically, just wondering if i could harness that effect and re use it.

Read full topic

item.title: playerName+?
item.dc:creator: @Coldbloodio Coldbloodio
item.description:
@Coldbloodio wrote:

I think you can only do this manually, I think it works if the players name has a capital letter in the beginning…like when I create an account I put like Hello for the username not hello…Just a guess

Read full topic
